task_text: We need to maintain salary parity. List me project leads that have salary higher than Marina Vukalović

text_blocks: I'll help you find project leads with salaries higher than Marina Vukalović. Let me start by checking your identity and gathering the necessary information.
The search didn't find Marina Vukalović directly. Let me try a different search approach:
Let me try listing employees to find Marina:
Let me continue searching for Marina through the employee list:
Let me continue searching for Marina Vukalović:

projects.name: HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies
Zinc-rich primer trial for fabrication line
Loading ramp and dock floor system
Fast-cure floor system for cold warehouses

text_blocks: I have all 36 projects. Now let me get the details of each project to identify the Leads:

project.name: HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies
project.description: Development and validation of a high-value anti-corrosion coating system for rail bogies.

project.name: Signal mast & infrastructure coating upgrade
project.description: System upgrade for signal masts and exposed rail infrastructure elements.

project.name: High-temperature coating for presses
project.description: High-temperature resistant coating system for industrial presses and conveyors.

project.name: Quick-clean primer for machinery line
project.description: Fast-cleaning shop-floor primer to reduce line downtime at Machina Press Systems.

project.name: Hygienic flooring for processing area
project.description: Floor system for food & beverage processing lines with hygienic, washable finish.

project.name: Warehouse floor coating system
project.description: Optimised industrial floor system for high-traffic logistics hubs.

project.name: Low-VOC floor system upgrade
project.description: Upgrade of floor coating system to a lower-VOC, regulation-compliant version.

project.name: Structural steel protection system
project.description: System for structural steel in construction applications in the Iberia region.

project.name: Chassis line corrosion package
project.description: Robust corrosion protection package for automotive chassis line components.

project.name: Zinc-rich primer trial for fabrication line
project.description: Trial of zinc-rich primer system for regional fabricated steel structures.

text_blocks: Continuing to get more project details:

project.name: IT – Chatbot & Progress wrapper pilot
project.description: Internal project for wrapping legacy Progress systems with a chatbot interface.

project.name: R&D – Low-VOC formulation platform
project.description: Internal research project for a new generation of low-VOC formulations.

project.name: Depot steel refurbishment system
project.description: Coating system for steel structures in AlpineRail depot halls and maintenance pits.

project.name: High-build machinery primer optimisation
project.description: Optimisation of a high-build primer system for heavy machinery frames at RhineMach.

project.name: Hygienic tank lining series
project.description: Development of solventborne and waterborne tank linings for Mediterranean Bottling syrup and water tanks.

project.name: Loading ramp and dock floor system
project.description: Impact- and slip-resistant floor system for NordPort loading ramps and dock areas.

project.name: Pre-treatment interface for e-coat line
project.description: Coating system tuned for CentraleAuto's pre-treatment stage feeding an existing e-coat line.

project.name: Bridge steel anti-corrosion package
project.description: Multi-coat anti-corrosion package for bridge and viaduct steel structures along the Danube.

project.name: Fast-cure floor system for cold warehouses
project.description: Fast-curing industrial floor system for cold and ambient warehouses applied by Benelux Floor Solutions.

project.name: Cleanroom-compatible coating package
project.description: Coating package for Helvetic FoodTech equipment and adjacent cleanroom surfaces.

project.name: Galvanised steel touch-up system
project.description: Touch-up and repair system for galvanised structural steel delivered by CentralSteel Engineering.

project.name: Port crane repainting specification
project.description: Specification and trial programme for repainting port cranes and gantries in Adriatic harbours.

project.name: Liquid-to-powder topcoat crossover support
project.description: Support project to transition selected Carpathia Metalworks lines from liquid to compatible powder topcoats.

project.name: Multi-substrate coating portfolio
project.description: Portfolio of harmonised primers and topcoats for Visegrad Industrial's steel and aluminium components.

project.name: Freezer room floor trial
project.description: Trial of a low-temperature curing floor system in NordicCold deep-freeze rooms.

project.name: Bogie component coating system
project.description: Cost-effective coating system for welded bogie components at BalkanRail Components.

project.name: Paint defect audit for railcars
project.description: Root cause analysis and audit of recurring paint defects on selected FerroRail railcars.

project.name: Eco-friendly topcoat concept study
project.description: Concept study for a more eco-friendly topcoat system for selected FerroRail passenger railcars.

project.name: Press line coating rationalisation
project.description: Rationalisation of Machina Press coating portfolio across multiple press and conveyor lines.

project.name: Wall and ceiling coating phase 2
project.description: Second-phase implementation of low-VOC wall and ceiling coatings in FreshFoods processing areas.

text_blocks: Let me get the remaining projects:

project.name: Ramp repair and recoating programme
project.description: Programme for repair and recoating of worn loading ramps at EuroFlooring-operated sites.

project.name: E-coat compatible primer trial
project.description: Trial of an e-coat compatible primer system on NovaAuto chassis components.

project.name: Workshop coating standards and training
project.description: Definition of coating standards and basic application training for BalkanMetal fabrication workshops.

project.name: Fire-protection topcoat certification
project.description: Certification and testing programme for Iberia Construction fire-protection topcoat systems.

project.name: Operations – Serbia debottlenecking initiative
project.description: Internal cross-functional initiative to debottleneck key production stages at the Serbian plant.

project.name: HR – skills & wills data cleanup
project.description: Internal project to clean up and harmonise skills and wills data across the employee registry.
